content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE WwiDataADLS
WITH (LOCATION = 'abfss://wwi@asadatalake471731.dfs.core.windows.net') ;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat
WITH ( 
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, 
    FORMAT_OPTIONS ( FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', STRING_DELIMITER = '"')
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE QuarterlySales
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'quarterly-sales',
    DATA_SOURCE = WwiDataADLS,
    FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormat
)
AS
SELECT 
     InvoiceYear,
     InvoiceQuarter,
     Sum(cast([Quantity] as int)) as SalesQuantity
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asadatalake471731.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi/factsale-deltalake',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE InvoiceYear=2012
GROUP BY
     InvoiceYear,
     InvoiceQuarter
